sentences.en: A statuette awarded annually for outstanding achievement in radio and television advertising.
sentences.cn: 他凭着自己的才能为别人滥拍电视广告.

sentences.en: An Oscar statuette also may be presented as an Honorary Award.
sentences.cn: 他还可以作为荣誉奖颁发.

sentences.en: Evidence also arrives in difficult-to-identify forms like a carved statuette, a belt, or a small vial of medicinal powder.
sentences.cn: 到这儿的证物有时是种难以辨认的形式，像是刻过的雕像，皮带或是一小瓶药粉。

sentences.en: In my earlier years , I found even the statuette of the Thinker confusing.
sentences.cn: 更小一点的时候, 我甚至觉得思索者塑像也是令人迷惑的.

sentences.en: In my house there is a statuette.
sentences.cn: 在我家里有一座小塑像.

sentences.en: It seems alive, and even this funny statuette seems to have a soul.
sentences.cn: 这座城市看起来活力四射，甚至这座有趣的小塑像好像也有灵魂。

sentences.en: The Academy's world - renowned statuette was born.
sentences.cn: 该艺术科学院 举世闻名 的小雕像就此诞生了.

sentences.en: The Prize consists of a statuette - “the Nkosi” - and 100,000 euros, which are to be awarded to a direct aid project in the spirit of the young winner’s efforts.
sentences.cn: 奖品是一座价值100，000欧元的“恩科西”小雕像，该奖旨在嘉奖年轻获奖者在直接参与帮助事件上所付出的精神努力。

sentences.en: There's nothing like a little golden statuette on the mantelpiece to burnish a fragile ego.
sentences.cn: 对于明星们来说,如果能够在壁炉上摆放上一座小小的金质奖杯,该是多么的荣耀啊!

sentences.en: This $ 350,000 solid gold statuette is not the original trophy.
sentences.cn: 这座价值35万美元的赤金小雕像并非原来的.

trans.tran_en: a very small statue that can be put on a table or shelf
